member.name: TTPOLYGONHEADER
member.summary: The TTPOLYGONHEADER structure specifies the starting position and type of a contour in a TrueType character outline.

member.name: TTPOLYGONHEADER.cb
member.summary: The number of bytes required by the TTPOLYGONHEADER structure and structure or structures required to describe the contour of the character.

member.name: TTPOLYGONHEADER.dwType
member.summary: The type of character outline returned. Currently, this value must be TT_POLYGON_TYPE.

member.name: TTPOLYGONHEADER.pfxStart
member.summary: The starting point of the contour in the character outline.
